name: BloodShot (TremaineTan)
description:
Fast Action-Packed Game

##FOR WINDOWS ONLY##

Shoot Enemies to earn points

Game ends when:
Player shoots at a bomb
Player allows a red enemy to escape (Out of the screen)

Download the game for FREE and have fun!

Also, share with your friends to compare your scores!!!

*Please help me improve by commenting down below any bugs or problems with the game! I would try my best to solve the problems as soon as possible*
